post_title: Drum Back for a Drum Back Swap?
post_content:
Hi All!  card is not for sale.  Looking to swap this Drum Back Bugs Raymond SGC A - Auth for any of the following Drum Backs (I know long shot but never hurts to ask?):

Bill Abstein
Lefty Leifield Batting
Nick Maddox
Decaon Phillippe

cash added or subtracted depending upon condition offsets.
